lender.name: La Vernia Students 7th

lender.name: Patrick

lender.name: Karey
lender.loan_because:
You must teach what is in accord with sound doctrine. Teach the older men to be temperate, worthy of respect, self-controlled, and sound in faith, in love and in endurance.
Likewise, teach the older women to be reverent in the way they live, not to be slanderers or addicted to much wine, but to teach what is good. Then they can train the younger women to love their husbands and children, to be self-controlled and pure, to be busy at home, to be kind, and to be subject to their husbands, so that no one will malign the word of God.
Similarly, encourage the young men to be self-controlled. In everything set them an example by doing what is good. In your teaching show integrity, seriousness and soundness of speech that cannot be condemned, so that those who oppose you may be ashamed because they have nothing bad to say about us. Titus 2:1-8

Analysis freshwater catfish try specification Seed kind : Sangkuriang catfish (5-6cm) Population : 15.000 Tank capacity : 70 m Long production : 2 month Investasi Sewa lahan 300m selama 1 tahun Rp. 1.000.000 Pembuatan kolam masa pakai 10 periode Rp. 640.000 Terpal Rp. 125.000 Pipa PVC Rp. 425.000 Bak control Rp. 100.000 Total investasi Rp. 2.290.000 Biaya Operasional Bibit 15.000 @Rp. 150 Rp. 2.250.000 Pakan pelet 900 kg @ Rp. 6500 Rp. 5.850.000 Obat-obatan dan vitamin Rp. 150.000 Garam Rp. 6.000 Pupuk kandang Rp. 12.000 Penyusutan kolam Rp. 64.000 Perbaikan kolam Rp. 15.000 Penyusutan sewa lahan Rp. 100.000 Penyusutan terpal Rp. 6.250 Penyusutan PVC Rp. 21.250 Penyusutan bak kontrol Rp. 4.000 Total investasi Rp. 8.478.500 Penerimaan 1000 kg lele @ Rp. 13.000 Rp. 13.000.000 Keuntungan Rp. 13.000.000 Rp. 8.478.500 = Rp. 4.521.000

lender.name: Leticia
lender.loan_because: I didn't fully understand how microloans could change lives until I read Muhammad Yunus' books. Now I would ask: If you have enough, or more than enough, how can you not loan? I loan because I can, and if you can you must.
lender.occupational_info: I have studied & worked in theatre,but that's mostly for love, not money! For a living, I have worked in the community, especially with youth, to build their confidence, their skills and their understanding of how and why an education can be the key to a life full of choices.

lender.name: Nadine
lender.loan_because: I can. There is nothing better than helping out a friend in need. I help entrepreneurs start up businesses that will change their lives, AND they return my money too. I loan because their is no downside!!!
lender.occupational_info: I do not currently work. In the past I was employed at a very large grocery store and tobacco shop.

lender.name: Roy Marvelous
lender.loan_because: for every 100 Facebook fans I donate another $25 to Kiva :)
lender.occupational_info: I hate talking about work. Let's talk about play!

lender.name: ANNE
lender.loan_because: to make a difference...

lender.name: Tihomir
lender.loan_because: To enact change through Goodwill and empowering people by practical measures.
lender.occupational_info: In the healing procession at a busy Osteopathic & naturopathic clinic

lender.name: Karen
lender.loan_because: the people who are starting their business are also helping their communities. I admire their hard work and dedication.
lender.occupational_info: I work in a medical clinic.

lender.name: Five Rivers
lender.occupational_info: Five Rivers internet marketing is a professional Search engine optimisation company based in West Midlands, UK, specialises in online internet marketing. Five Rivers Internet Marketing experts carry a result driven approach in order to achieve top ranking on all major search engines (Google, yahoo, Bing (MSN) etc) for your website.

lender.name: John
lender.loan_because: it helps entrepreneurs around the world improve their lives while instilling a sense of personal responsibility that contributes to the entrepreneur's ultimate success. Also, it feels good to know whom I am helping and see their results.
lender.occupational_info: I run a non-profit filmmakers collective dedicated to creating documentaries that illuminate our most challenging global problems and inspire the social change necessary to solve them.

lender.name: hulagirltikiboy
lender.loan_because: I believe that little things make this world a better place

lender.name: Stan Cohen
lender.loan_because: I am fortunate that God has provided for my needs and I feel it is just as important to help others to help themselves. I firmly believe that people would rather have the tools to fish instead of being fed. I am so excited that I can reach out on a global level in my own small way, and help improve the lives of my brothers and sisters in far off places who have not been as fortunate.

lender.name: Neil Lee
lender.loan_because: I want to help others make a difference and I believe micro-finance is a great way to support and encourage initiative and enterprise.
lender.occupational_info: Work on internet training materials and coaching resources.

lender.name: De Studio kalmhout
lender.loan_because: once I've been saved by a loan someone helped me with. If you want something give it away than you have it
lender.occupational_info: I have a wellnessinstitute and with 5% euro each customer is spending we help new entrepeneurs gave them back to themselves

lender.name: Natalie
lender.occupational_info: I'm a full time student in California, majoring in Communications and Global Studies. When I graduate I want to do International Business, and travel around the word.
